data.name: Dynamic rounding number
data.description:
Round any number to the n-th largest number.

### Examples

Round to ceiling

```js
RoundNumber.ceiling(123) // 200 - round to the hundrenth
RoundNumber.ceiling(8792.65) // 9000 - round to the thousand
RoundNumber.ceiling(90848415.1) // 100000000 - round to the millionth

// Support for negative number
RoundNumber.ceiling(-123) // 0 - round to the hundrenth
RoundNumber.ceiling(-28.5) // -10 - round to the tenth
```

Round to floor

```js
RoundNumber.floor(123) // 100 - round to the hundrenth
RoundNumber.floor(8792.65) // 7000 - round to the thousand

// Support for negative number
RoundNumber.floor(-123) // -100 - round to the hundrenth
RoundNumber.floor(-28.5) // -20 - round to the tenth
```
